text.div:
id us-core-patient-name

url : http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/SearchParameter/us-core-patient-name

version : 4.0.1

name : USCorePatientName

derivedFrom : http://hl7.org/fhir/SearchParameter/Patient-name

status : active

date : 04/14/2022

publisher : HL7 International - Cross-Group Projects

contact : http://www.hl7.org/Special/committees/cgp

jurisdiction : United States of America (the) (Details : {urn:iso:std:iso:3166 code 'US' = 'United States of America', given as 'United States of America (the)'})

code : name

base :Patient

type : string

expression : Patient.name

xpath : f:Patient/f:name

xpathUsage : normal

mulitpleOr : True (Conformance Expectation = MAY)

mulitpleAnd : True ( Conformance Expectation = MAY)

name: USCorePatientName
description:
**A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the HumanName, including family, give, prefix, suffix, suffix, and/or text**  
**NOTE**: This US Core SearchParameter definition extends the usage context of the
[Conformance expectation extension](http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/extension-capabilitystatement-expectation.html)
 - multipleAnd
 - multipleOr
 - comparator
 - modifier
 - chain
